title: My Google pixel 3 XL gave me a electrical shock three separate times while trying to charge it.
content: My pixel 3 XL Electrically shocked me three separate times three separate  locations. I took the phone back to Sprint and even though the phone is only 28 days old and Sprint supposedly gives you a no questions ask moneyback guarantee they refused to return the phone. Now I have a brand new pixel 3 XL that I’m being forced to pay for that I can’t use.
